name: Ede
overview: An educational adventure with multiplication quizzes. Released in 64'er Sonderheft Issue: 46 magazine. Ede 64 could be described as a calculation adventure that leads to the solution after more than 20 pictures. A small dog guides you from station to station, at each of which you have to carry out three multiplications. You can choose several levels of difficulty, the more difficult the game, the shorter the amount of time you have to solve the tasks. Ede is a dog looking for the secret of the multiplication tables. In order to help him, the tasks on the screen should be solved correctly.
